summary: Powerful take on the Spectral Arrow and Lightning spells, also some Godly equipment to transform your character into a god.
descriptionHtml:
Powerful take on the Spectral Arrow and Lightning spells, also some Godly equipment to transform your character into a god.
all 9 items are waiting in the chest on the stairs to High HrothgarÂ 
Apollo's Sandals
Hephaestus' Ring
Loki's Charm
Odin's Crown
Odin's Soul Gem
Odin's Arrows
Odin's Hammer
and the Spell Tomes for Odin's Arrow and Odin's Wrath
also all items are Craftable at a Forge
Not lore accurate and uses %100 vanilla resources but fun to use

**Bug fix, I forgot to delete a script and picking up Loki's Charm triggered the "Blood on the ice" quest but unable to continue it, it is now removed and no other bugs yet to be found.**
version 1.2 now
author: dber1962

files.name: Odin's Arrows
files.changelogHtml: Bug fix, I forgot to delete a script and picking up Loki's Charm triggered the "Blood on the ice" quest but unable to continue it, it is now removed and no other bugs yet to be found.
